snippet.title: Hexodius - PC/XBLA - Shoot me I'm famous! (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Out now on Steam and in October on XBLA ! Check out the demo on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/236490/?snr=1_7_15__13
With its potent blend of twin‐stick shooting, exploration and customization, Hexodius invites players to explore the vast complex, equip their drone with powerful items and upgrades, and ultimately escape the clutches of the deadly enemy droids in a blaze of laser fire.

For more information, visit your local Namco Bandai website, http://www.namcobandaigames.eu 

Like us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/namcobandaigames.europe

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
